title: Starpoint.Gemini.2.Repack-R.G.Mechanics

Game information:  


In command of his own spaceship and surf the galaxy in this three-dimensional
tactical space simulator with elements of RPG! Never before has the space was
not so attractive - but appearances can be deceiving ...

For the past two years have passed since the end of the Second War of Gemini
and the situation in the war-torn system is anything but calm. A squad of
freedom fighters called the League of the Twins now reduced to a small group,
devoid of power and influence after the loss of their leaders. Meanwhile,
Empire used the newly discovered star point to occupy betrayed her once
Gemini system - and not only.

Huge fleet of warships of the Empire and the giant space bases cleaned destroyed
the resistance movement. The situation looked hopeless, when they suddenly stopped
their armada and again focused on strengthening the star point. Soon rumors,
if they are afraid of something going for them through the T-gate from the heart
of the Empire. What caused them to flee, drawing very powerful empire in awe?

Starpoint Gemini 2 entice players into a breathtaking journey to the dark secrets
and unthinkable turns to finally reveal the incredible truth ...


Game Features:  

Complex, but easy to use system RPG, now augmented dynamic three-dimensional
battle in real time.

Explore the dynamic game world as a whole, rather than through individual cards.

Fifty different factions, ranging from states and companies to the outcasts,
engaged in a struggle for power, but more than 100 different products offer
great opportunities for trade and plunder.

More than 70 unique ships with the ability to upgrade the various ship systems,
observation tower and a rich arsenal of devastating weapons, allowing
smash the enemy into pieces.

Hire mercenary captains who share your fate in the travel and assign officers
to key positions on the ship (the engine room, navigation, tactics).

Random missions are generated depending on the actions and preferences of the player.


RePack Features:  

Starpoint Gemini 2
